remarks: Right composition with a function on the index sets yields a ring homomorphism of structure powers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwsco1rhm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s A ) $.
pwsco1rhm.z $e |- Z = ( R ^s B ) $.
pwsco1rhm.c $e |- C = ( Base ` Z ) $.
pwsco1rhm.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
pwsco1rhm.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
pwsco1rhm.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
pwsco1rhm.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
pwsco1rhm $p |- ( ph -> ( g e. C |-> ( g o. F ) ) e. ( Z RingHom Y ) ) $.
$d A g $.
$d B g $.
$d C g $.
$d F g $.
$d R g $.
$d Y g $.
$d Z g $.
$d g ph $.
